verses.verse: Beloved, <S%G27><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Believe, <S%G4100><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Prove <S%G1381><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirits, <S%G4151><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> They Are; <S%G2076><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> False Prophets <S%G5578><s%> Have Gone Out <S%G1831><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World. <S%G2889><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Any <S%G3956><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Confesses Not <S%G3670><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Flesh <S%G4561><s%> Come, <S%G2064><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Is : <S%G2076><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> That Power <S%G3588><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Antichrist, <S%G500><s%> Of Which <S%G3739><s%> Ye Heard <S%G191><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> It Comes, <S%G2064><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World <S%G2889><s%> Is It <S%G2076><s%> Already. <S%G2235><s%>

Ye <S%G5210><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Are, <S%G2075><s%> Little Children, <S%G5040><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Have Overcome <S%G3528><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Greater <S%G3187><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> He Who Is <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> Than <S%G2228><s%> He Who Is <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World. <S%G2889><s%>

They <S%G846><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World <S%G2889><s%> Are; <S%G1526><s%> Because Of <S%G1223><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World <S%G2889><s%> They Talk, <S%G2980><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World <S%G2889><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Hears. <S%G191><s%>

Beloved, <S%G27><s%> We Should Love <S%G25><s%> One Another; <S%G240><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Is, <S%G2076><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Everyone <S%G3956><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Loves, <S%G25><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Has Been Begotten, <S%G1080><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Knows <S%G1097><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> This <S%G5129><s%> Was Manifested <S%G5319><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> As To <S%G1722><s%> Us, <S%G2254><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5207><s%> His Son <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Only Begotten <S%G3439><s%> Has Sent <S%G649><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World, <S%G2889><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> We Might Live <S%G2198><s%> ' Through <S%G1223><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

Beloved, <S%G27><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> So <S%G3779><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Loved <S%G25><s%> Us, <S%G2248><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> Ought <S%G3784><s%> One Another <S%G240><s%> To Love. <S%G25><s%>

God <S%G2316><s%> No One <S%G3762><s%> At Any Time <S%G4455><s%> Has Seen; <S%G2300><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> We Should Love <S%G25><s%> One Another, <S%G240><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Us <S%G2254><s%> Abides, <S%G3306><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G26><s%> His Love <S%G846><s%> Perfected <S%G5048><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Us. <S%G2254><s%>

By <S%G1722><s%> This <S%G5129><s%> We Know <S%G1097><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> We Abide, <S%G3306><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Us, <S%G2254><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4151><s%> His Spirit <S%G846><s%> He Has Given <S%G1325><s%> To Us. <S%G2254><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> Have Seen <S%G2300><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Bear Witness <S%G3140><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Has Sent <S%G649><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son As <S%G5207><s%> Saviour <S%G4990><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> World. <S%G2889><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> This <S%G5129><s%> Has Been Perfected <S%G5048><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Us, <S%G2257><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Boldness <S%G3954><s%> We May Have <S%G2192><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Judgment, <S%G2920><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Even As <S%G2531><s%> He <S%G1565><s%> Is, <S%G2076><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> Are <S%G2070><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2889><s%> This World. <S%G5129><s%>

Fear <S%G5401><s%> <S%G3756><s%> There Is Not <S%G2076><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Love, <S%G26><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Perfect <S%G5046><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> Out <S%G1854><s%> Casts <S%G906><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Fear; <S%G5401><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Fear <S%G5401><s%> Torment <S%G2851><s%> Has, <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And He That <S%G1161><s%> Fears <S%G5399><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Has Not Been Made Perfect <S%G5048><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Love. <S%G26><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> <S%G2036><s%> Should Say, <S%G3754><s%> I Love <S%G25><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Brother <S%G80><s%> His <S%G846><s%> Should Hate, <S%G3404><s%> A Liar <S%G5583><s%> He Is. <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3588><s%> For He That <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Loves Not <S%G25><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> His Brother <S%G846><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> He Has Seen, <S%G3708><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3756><s%> He Has Not Seen, <S%G3708><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> Is He Able <S%G1410><s%> To Love? <S%G25><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Commandment <S%G1785><s%> We Have <S%G2192><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Loves <S%G25><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Should Love <S%G25><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Brother <S%G80><s%> His. <S%G846><s%>
